short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is no longer updated. Please try the new Sound Sentinel web page notifications to never miss important notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To better serve you, I have launched a new extension【Sound Sentinel】, which is an ideal alternative for web page notification optimization to ensure that you will not miss important reminders.

Download [Sound Sentinel] now:
https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/sound-sentinel/fpodaeejldcmbkachkpdfgjeaboficoo

Learn more about Chrome's autoplay policy:
"Autoplay Policy in Chrome"
https://developer.chrome.com/blog/autoplay#new_behaviors
